originalText.text: MY name is Marlene I had a horrible experience at Icon parking today 4/3/2023 at  339 E 28th St, New York, NY 10016 . There’s a male Hispanic working there I had an appointment above you right across for some bloodwork didn’t even take 10 minutes    and this guy was charging me over $50 plus tip it’s so unfair and this employee is so unprofessional I felt harass that this guy was asking for more money. While I told this employee that on th signs it’s at $8:25 and  more than an hour $33.00  - this owner needs to find someone that know how to work not to abuse the violations of the parking garage never coming here again.

originalText.text: I drove in and there was nobody in the booth, no stop sign to where vehicles should stop when entering. I drove past more than I should have, but first time going in to this garage I didnt know. The attendant came out of no where and told me I was supposed to stop by the booth. I explained to him multiple times there wasn't any sign to indicate what he's saying. He kept repeating himself and so did I, and finally asked him if he was going to give me a ticket so i can go on my merry way or should I leave. He told me NO he will not give me a ticket and i won't be able to park there. Being a NYer I blessed his whole family before leaving and parked at another parking garage around the corner. Poor customer service.

originalText.text: Was a great experience, made a reservation online and the process was easy. I also was able to add a coupon to the reservation to bring the price down. Staff was courteous and efficient. And was able to get the car in less then 2 min.

originalText.text: Two days in a row this place bluntly refuses to take mobile coupons; even when I pointed out the mobile code they still ask for a hard copy; outrageous rip-off; will avoid Icon facilities all together.
